third_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_receive_detail set third_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_category = #{inventoryCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_unit_price = #{inventoryUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_num = #{deliveryNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_company = #{deliveryCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_number = #{purchaseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select product_model, inventory_category, inventory_unit_price, warehouse, delivery_time, invoice_number, delivery_num, delivery_company, purchase_number, remark,id as error_id_str,error_msg as third_error_msg from t_receive_detail where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and error_msg is not null
select count(1) from t_receive_detail where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and error_msg is not null

select b.*,c.dealer_name from t_receive_detail a inner join t_receive_detail_update b on a.third_id = b.third_id inner join t_deliver_receive_record c on a.record_id = c.id where a.record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update t_receive_detail set error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where third_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
